title: NFTreviewer00
author: NFTreviewer00
content: $BFIGHT listed on CMC and CG within 12 hours of launch!Massive influencers like Matt Wallace, Bitlord, Joe Grower will promote $BFIGHT!We are months ahead on the roadmap.Once we open staking and hit 2,000 holders that's "Pre Drinks" finished a full 2 months early!#NFTs #Metaverse #VR fights and more*Blow off steam in the metaverse, own your NFT character and knock some teeth out to earn crypto!*$BFIGHT token is set to take the metaverse market by storm. This is virtual barfights! Design your patron’s attire whether it be a wife beater singlet or suit, select your weapon of choice from bottles to tasers and get swinging – winner takes all!The BAR FIGHTS 2023 game** is scheduled for release for both PC and VR in Q1 2023 and will include 3 metaverse scenes – the bar, a carpark, and a smoking area. Each will be unique in its design and interactivity. Players will be able to complete in several modes:- 1 v 1 (P2P)- 10 V 10 (team)- 1 V 10 (single player) modes- 100 V 100 (battle royal)Marketing- Massive influencers like Matt Wallace- Dextools trending- UFC, MMA Boxers to promote BarfightMore and more…https://linktr.ee/barfighttoken**Contract:** https://etherscan.io/token/0x6B5DDe2c94EcC10C93e8A44288bEFAD2a89bd657

comments.author: NFTreviewer00
comments.body: Matt Wallace (One of the biggest influencers who followed by Elon Musk) shares Barfight Token in his twitter and website. Also will promote it more in the coming days.
